name: Fish in a Barrel
description: In a final gambit to prove his point that the Federation and its allies are unprepared for what's to come, Fullerton turns Risa into a hunting ground, unleashing several predators on the unsuspecting tourists. Put a stop to his twisted game for good!
rules:
-- Unique Borg, Cardassian, and Hirogen Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Pascal Fullerton any version of Leeta, Torres, Bashir or Casual crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Pascal Fullerton, Leeta, Torres, Bashir or Casual
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Esmar
featured_crew.flavor: After the assimilation of Starfleet’s youngest, Esmar took control of the USS Titan.

featured_crew.name: Torres
featured_crew.flavor: Torres appears at the luau in a tropical dress, and looks simply smashing.

action.name: Why Don't You Take a Break?

featured_crew.name: Bashir
featured_crew.flavor: Leeta and Bashir perform the Bajoran Rite of Separation while on Risa.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Esmar
rewards.flavor: After the assimilation of Starfleet’s youngest, Esmar took control of the USS Titan.

rewards.name: Bashir
rewards.flavor: Leeta and Bashir perform the Bajoran Rite of Separation while on Risa.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

goals.flavor: Bring the hunt to an end with the Borg.

potential_rewards.name: Borg Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

potential_rewards.name: Cardassian Union Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Cardassian faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Someday, you'll understand how altruistic my intentions truly are. You'll see this was all for the betterment of the Federation. But it seems a heavy hand is the only way to get through to all of you."

"If you've come to Risa in search of something different, I'm happy to give it to you. Several of my associates, who have their own grievances with the Federation, are now on the planet's surface, and they're here to play a little game. Hide if you can, or become their prey."
"I'm sure you heard him, Captain. We're all doing our best to get the innocent tourists to safety, but there are so many of his 'associates'. We could use your help!"
